QuestData.Title: Big Problem, Little Vorkai
QuestData.Description:
Ara'lon's report matches what I have seen. Too many enemies, and too few of the Wild Hunt to dispose of them on our own.
Fortunately, I feel strongly inclined to take matters into my own hands. And avenge my fallen hunters.
Let us depart. We will show those monsters the fury of nature.
QuestData.RewardText:
We have slain so many, and yet more remain. We must get to the heart of this evil and tear it out.
If we don't, then soon it could spread all across Ardenweald.
